verses.verse: <S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> are your <S%H6471>feet<s%> with <S%H5275>shoes,<s%> O <S%H5081>prince's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter!<s%> the <S%H2542>joints<s%> of your <S%H3409>thighs<s%> are <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H2484>jewels,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H542>cunning<s%> <S%H542>workman.<s%>

Your <S%H8326>navel<s%> is like a <S%H5469>round<s%> <S%H101>goblet,<s%> which <S%H2637>wants<s%> not <S%H4197>liquor:<s%> your <S%H990>belly<s%> is like an <S%H6194>heap<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H5473>set<s%> <S%H5473>about<s%> with <S%H7799>lilies.<s%>

Your <S%H6677>neck<s%> is as a <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory;<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> like the fish <S%H1295>pools<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> by the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1337>Bathrabbim:<s%> your <S%H639>nose<s%> is as the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> which <S%H6822>looks<s%> toward <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%>

Your <S%H7218>head<s%> on you is like <S%H3760>Carmel,<s%> and the <S%H1803>hair<s%> of your <S%H7218>head<s%> like <S%H713>purple;<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> is <S%H631>held<s%> in the <S%H7298>galleries.<s%>
<S%H2063>This<s%> your <S%H6967>stature<s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> to a <S%H8558>palm<s%> tree, and your <S%H7699>breasts<s%> to <S%H811>clusters<s%> of grapes.

I <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H8558>palm<s%> tree, I will <S%H270>take<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H5577>boughs<s%> thereof: <S%H4994>now<s%> also your <S%H7699>breasts<s%> shall be as <S%H811>clusters<s%> of the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of your <S%H639>nose<s%> like <S%H8598>apples;<s%>

And the <S%H2441>roof<s%> of your <S%H2441>mouth<s%> like the <S%H2896>best<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> for my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> that <S%H1980>goes<s%> down <S%H4339>sweetly,<s%> causing the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of those that are <S%H3463>asleep<s%> to <S%H1680>speak.<s%>
I am my <S%H1730>beloved's,<s%> and his <S%H8669>desire<s%> is <S%H5921>toward<s%> me.
<S%H3212>Come,<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> let us <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H7704>field;<s%> let us <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the <S%H3723>villages.<s%>

Let us get up <S%H7925>early<s%> to the <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%> let us <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H6524>flourish,<s%> whether the tender <S%H5563>grape<s%> <S%H6524>appear,<s%> and the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> <S%H5132>bud<s%> <S%H5132>forth:<s%> there will I <S%H5414>give<s%> you my <S%H1730>loves.<s%>

The <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H7381>smell,<s%> and <S%H5921>at<s%> our <S%H6607>gates<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> manner of <S%H4022>pleasant<s%> fruits, <S%H2319>new<s%> and <S%H3465>old,<s%> which I have <S%H6845>laid<s%> up for you, O my <S%H1730>beloved.<s%>
